exampleSentences.sentence: This topological understanding of Euler’s formula — in which the shapes were rubber-like and not rigid — was first presented in an article by Johann Listing in 1861.

source.author: By Tyler Freel/Outdoor Life
source.title: Dress like an Alaskan to weather the winter cold

exampleSentences.sentence: Different variations of Baffins and Sorels—think rubber bottom, synthetic top—boots are popular, good with moisture, and more lightweight, but generally not as effective in extreme cold as the bunny boots.

source.author: Jesse Dougherty
source.title: The Nationals’ bullpen doesn’t need a makeover. But it could use another arm or two.

exampleSentences.sentence: They have Clay and Harper, a rubber arm fit to swing between the majors and minors.

source.author: By Saveur
source.title: Four tips for bake-off worthy cakes

exampleSentences.sentence: Once you pour your batter into the pan, smooth its top with a rubber spatula.

source.author: Daniela Galarza
source.title: Squishy, sweet homemade marshmallows will elevate your s’mores and hot chocolate

exampleSentences.sentence: Lightly grease a rubber spatula with oil and use it to transfer the marshmallow mixture to the greased pan, spreading it evenly but quickly, as it will start to set.

source.author: Sandra Gutierrez G.
source.title: Five tips for taking care of your over-washed hands

exampleSentences.sentence: Wearing rubber gloves will protect you from any hard chemicals and excess water, so keep them at hand and replace them if they tear—you want to keep those digits nice and dry at all times.

source.author: Andreas Wagner
source.title: Why It Pays to Play Around - Issue 94: Evolving

exampleSentences.sentence: After the period of isolation, the researchers taught all the rats to get a food reward by pulling a rubber ball out of the way.

source.author: Umair Irfan
source.title: Why staying cold is so important to a Covid-19 vaccine

exampleSentences.sentence: Even the self-sealing rubber stoppers on the vials could face a shortfall.

source.author: Eric Alt
source.title: Best running shoes for men: Five things to consider

exampleSentences.sentence: Porous fabrics provide better breathability, so stay away from rubber anywhere but on the soles of your running shoes.
The boiled wool keeps my feet comfortable with or without socks, while the rubber soles are thick enough for walking the dog or quick trips to the store.
